page.title: 06DISTRICT ADMINISTRATION
page.content: Our parish is part of the Rural District of Rother. The District Council is responsible for Council Housing, Public Health, Recreation and Tourism, and Planning. We share a Council member with Brede, the next village. East Sussex County Council looks after roads, schools, libraries etc. We are part of Winchelsea polling district. Elections for these two Councils, and for the Parish Council take place every four years. The Parish Council consists of five members and no politics are involved in the election of these. Their function is to pin_point and provide very local amenities, and to act as a pressure group and liaison body where communication with outside bodies is necessary. We are part of the Parlimentary constituency of Battle and Bexhill. Our M>P> is Mr.Wardle.a
